description.narrative: National systems are strengthened to collect, analyze and disseminate high quality data on the situation of children to support adequate planning and investment, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Economic And Social Policy General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Evaluation And Research, Human Rights Institutions, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: SPPIM - : Evidence based advocacy and innovative partnership build the investment case for children

sector.narrative: Administrative data, registers and non-MICS household surveys and censuses
Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Cash Transfers: Delivery of cash transfers through government system (beneficiary identification, grievance mechanisms, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)
Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Delivery of cash transfers or voucher through new and/or parallel system (humanitarian context)
HSS - public finance management for Health
Multisector aid for basic social services
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities

description.narrative: General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs policy, planning and administration

Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

description.narrative: Significant advancements were made in the generation of quality evidence on situation of children and multidimensional child poverty in the country, as well as in capacity development of key national and provincial data producers. A specific focus was given to increase the quality of research and on Research Ethics | Status:Met | As-of Date:19/01/2017
